The Power of Market Leader Websites

Kelly Kanoa of Coldwell Banker Pacific Properties shares how the power of InTouch Pro, powered by Market Leader, helps her office reach contacts on a daily basis. Agents can offer their clients a searchable website to inquire about neighborhoods or a specific listing.

Customizable websites make it easy for agents to make adjustments and customize when they have a few minutes. Kelly’s tips to maximize the power of InTouch include loading all contacts into the CRM, getting the Pro version of the system to take advantage of the Blog and other Pro features, and embracing the website to stand out from the competition.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_color=”#f4f4f4″ custom_margin=”0px|||” custom_padding=”0px|||”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.7″ max_width=”900px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”40px|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ header_text_align=”center” text_orientation=”center”]

Explore the products that are helping Kelly grow her business:
